subject: Freestyle Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Jeret Peterson, known as Speedy, and Lacy Schnoor made the Olympic freestyle skiing team, winning the aerials event at the United States Olympic trials in Steamboat Springs, Colo. Peterson made his third Olympic team, landing two quadruple-twisting jumps to finish with 258.21 points and easily outdistance Dylan Ferguson.
